headline: L3Harris Introduces Launched Effects Vehicles to Increase US Multi-Domain Superiority
summary: WASHINGTON, July 17, 2025--L3Harris Technologies (NYSE: LHX) today debuted a pack of launched effects vehicles, demonstrating the company’s ability to respond to the U.S. Department of Defense’s urgent need for advanced, capable and affordable munitions it can employ across services and domains.

headline: L3Harris Technologies (LHX) Invests Nearly US$500 Million in Expansive Rocket Motor Campus
summary: L3Harris Technologies (LHX) is set for significant growth with its announcement of a $500 million investment in a large solid rocket motor production campus in Camden, enhancing its manufacturing capacity by six times. This expansion could potentially bolster investor confidence, aligning with the broader upward market trend, as major indices like the S&P 500 and Nasdaq continue to approach record highs. The 20.82% price increase in L3Harris over the last quarter likely reflects this positive...

headline: L3Harris to Build More than 20 New Large Solid Rocket Motor Manufacturing Facilities in Calhoun County, Arkansas
summary: Announcement comes after Gov. Sanders, AEDC met with L3Harris at Paris Air Show L3Harris Solid Rocket Motor Test in Camden, Arkansas L3Harris is investing $193 million to build 20 new large solid rocket motor manufacturing facilities in Calhoun County. A solid rocket motor test is performed in Camden, Arkansas. headline: L3Harris to Expand Solid Rocket Motor Production in Arkansas
summary: CAMDEN, Ark., July 17, 2025--L3Harris Technologies (NYSE: LHX) and Arkansas Gov. Sarah Huckabee Sanders have announced plans to construct an extensive large solid rocket motor (LSRM) production campus at the company’s site in Camden.

headline: L3Harris (LHX) Expected to Beat Earnings Estimates: Can the Stock Move Higher?
summary: L3Harris (LHX) possesses the right combination of the two key ingredients for a likely earnings beat in its upcoming report. Get prepared with the key expectations.
